packages.title: Optimum: 2 GB Data - 12 Months
packages.packageName: The optimum subscription providing you with enough service time to support the above-average user to enable your device to be up and running with inclusive Data and SMS services
packages.description:
2GB data per month
including 40 SMS
(5p / minute and 4p / SMS thereafter)

packages.title: Standard: 1GB Data - 12 Months
packages.packageName: The standard subscription providing you with enough service time to support the average user to enable your device to be up and running with inclusive Data and SMS services.
packages.description:
Up to 1 GB data per month
including 35 SMS
(5p / MB data and 4p / SMS thereafter)

packages.title: Basic: 500MB Data - 12 Months
packages.packageName: The basic starter subscription providing you with all you need to get your device up and running with inclusive Data and SMS services.
packages.description:
Up to 500MB of data per month
including 20 SMS
(5p / MB data and 4p / SMS thereafter)

packages.title: Optimum: 24GB Data - 1 Year
packages.packageName: The optimum subscription providing you with enough service time to support the above-average with data and SMS services to allow access to your device.
packages.description:
Up to 12GB of data per year
including 480 SMS
(5p / MB data and 4p / SMS thereafter)

packages.title: Standard: 12GB Data - 1 Year
packages.packageName: The standard subscription providing you with enough service time to support the average user with Data and SMS services to allow access to your device.
packages.description:
Up to 12GB of data per year
including 420 SMS
(5p / MB data and 4p / SMS thereafter)

packages.title: Basic: 6GB Data - 1 Year
packages.packageName: The basic starter subscription providing you with all you need to get you up and running with Data and SMS services to allow access to your device.
packages.description:
Up to 6GB of data per year
including 240 SMS
